T2DInt Struct Reference
[IPL98 2D and 3D structures (global)]

2-dimensional point with signed integer (INT16) values. More...

#include <ipl98_types_c_only.h>


Data Fields

INT16 x
 The first dimension.

INT16 y
 The second dimension.

Detailed Description

2-dimensional point with signed integer (INT16) values.

This type is only used by the C part of the library, if you use the C++ part of the library use the CPoint2D class instead.
